p: Consequently, the seasonality of the vector population dynamic could be simulated by a trigonometric function with a cycle of 18 months. From Fig 5, we can see that the model simulated 10 months (306 days) in a year, thus, T = 712. As the illness onset date was on 11 August, 2018, the simulation delay of the initial time in the whole season is 170 days, thus Ï„ = 170.
